title: Build with Someone Else’s Brain
objectives: Use external AI APIs (e.g., speech-to-text, image recognition, emotion detection)

justice_theme: Power, Dependence, and the Cost of Convenience
standards: AI4K12: Representation and Reasoning, Societal Impact
